postman.title: Use Postman to take control of our API
postman.text: A powerful GUI platform to make your API development faster & easier, from building API requests through testing, documentation and sharing.
postman.step3: In Import, then Import from link, enter this URL: https://liveobjects.orange-business.com/swagger
postman.step4: Go to Collections, then in Live Objects REST API Guide
postman.step5: Select an API and enter your API key in Headers section
postman.step6: Fill in the necessary settings in Params if needed
postman.step7: Click on Send to use the API and get its answer
